alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 30 at 8:26PM MDT until July 30 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 573 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA BENNETT CUSTER FALL RIVER JACKSON OGLALA LAKOTA IN WEST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA HAAKON MEADE PENNINGTON IN WYOMING THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST WYOMING CAMPBELL WESTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALLEN, BILLSBURG, BUCKHORN, CLARETON, CUSTER, DOWNTOWN NEWCASTLE, EDGEMONT, FAITH, FOUR CORNERS, GILLETTE, HERMOSA, HILL CITY, HOT SPRINGS, KADOKA, KIRLEY, KYLE, LACREEK WILDLIFE REFUGE, MARTIN, MILESVILLE, MORRISEY, OGLALA, PHILIP, PINE RIDGE, RAPID CITY, ROCHELLE, STURGIS, TUTHILL, UNION CENTER, UPTON, WALL, AND WRIGHT. THIS INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE PINE RIDGE RESERVATION.
